item.description:
The Greater Boston Scooter Clubs "The Premiere Scooter Clubs of New England" has their popular monthly "Take your scooter to breakfast" event, being held at Soundbites, in Somerville.

This breakfast is to celebrate a successful year in welcoming
13 new 2009 members to Twisted Touring and
67 new 2009 members to Twist & Go

GBSC: Twisted Touring 13 New 2009 Members !!!!!!
(Newest to Oldest)
